original_title: America's Alien Invasion: The Lost UFO Encounters
overview: Most Americans have no idea that the White House was swarmed by UFOs not once but twice, once in 1952 and again in 1963. The government knows that UFOs are here. Explore this phenomenon that is destined to impact our very being because we are not alone. -
title: America's Alien Invasion: The Lost UFO Encounters
